data.actual_result: It overlaps slightly on the last member, which can be difficult to select.
data.expected_result: There should be some spacing between the final person in the friends list and the bottom bar. It is not supposed to overlap any options.
data.short_description: Bottom bar overlaps the last member slightly in adding friends to group DMs [iPhone X / XS / XS Max specific ]
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to your Friends List - Click on Create Group DMs. - Scroll all of the way down to the bottom.
